title: Uber billionaire Kalanick on the defense
text:
Uber billionaire Kalanick on the defense   02:03 
Uber billionaire co-founder Travis Kalanick took the stand for a second day in court on Wednesday in a case that's as much about trade secrets as it is about his competitive personality. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
